metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20230 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in PSPP 1.2.0. There is a heap-based buffer overflow at the function read_bytes_internal in utilities/pspp-dump-sav.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20230` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pspp - 1.2.0-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pspp package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-5').
